DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy safety 100 , 150 200 mcg Misoprostol Vaginal Insert ( MVI 100 , MVI 150 MVI 200 ) woman require cervical ripen induction labor .
DOC.brief_title: Misoprostol Vaginal Insert ( MVI ) 100 , 150 , 200 mcg Cervical Ripening Induction Labor
DOC.criteria: Provide write informed consent ; Pregnant woman ≥ 36 week 0 day inclusive gestation ; Women age 18 year old ; Candidate pharmacologic induction labor ; Single , live vertex fetus ; Baseline modify Bishop score ≤ 4 ; Parity ≤ 3 ( parity define one birth live dead 24 week gestation ) ; Body Mass Index ( BMI ) ≤ 50 time entry study . Nulliparous woman participate pharmacokinetic ( PK ) arm study : woman hemoglobin level < 11.0 gram per deciliter ( g/dL ) ( confirm within one week study drug insertion ) ; Women active labor ; Presence uterine cervical scar uterine abnormality e.g. , bicornate uterus . Biopsies , include cone biopsy cervix , permit ; Administration oxytocin cervical ripen labor induce agent ( include mechanical method ) tocolytic drug within 7 day prior enrollment . Magnesium sulfate permit prescribed treatment preeclampsia gestational hypertension ; Severe preeclampsia mark Hemolytic anemia , Elevated Liver enzyme , Low Platelet count ( HELLP ) syndrome , endorgan affliction Central Nervous System ( CNS ) find mild headache ; Fetal malpresentation ; Diagnosed fetal abnormality ; Any evidence fetal compromise baseline ( e.g. , nonreassuring fetal heart rate pattern meconium stain ) ; Ruptured membrane ≥ 48 hour prior start treatment ; Suspected chorioamnionitis ; Fever ( oral aural temperature > 37.5˚C ) ; Any condition vaginal delivery contraindicate e.g. , placenta previa unexplained genital bleeding time 24 week pregnancy ; Known suspect allergy misoprostol , prostaglandins excipients ; Any condition urgently require delivery ; Unable comply protocol .
